content.rendered:
Blended Whisky 43%, 700ml
A blend of over ten malts and grains featuring Yamazaki, Hakushu and Chita all aged in five types of cask.

excerpt.rendered: Blended Whisky 43%, 700ml A blend of over ten malts and grains featuring Yamazaki, Hakushu and Chita all aged in five types of cask.
